description: Support to the implementation of the Integrated Drylands Development Programme in context of the CCD

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
Support to the implementation of the Integrated Drylands Development Programme in context of the United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification and Drought.  The outputs include:

1. Successful country programme implementation (unique to each country)
2. Programme formulation process finalized in Kenya and the Gambia
3. Activities to enhance programme impact through knowledge synthesis and dissemination, advocacy and building synergies with other global and regional processes.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Support to IDDP implementation
